channel.title: Tutorial on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: Tags
item.description: Learn theme support one default taxonomy of gohugo: the tag feature. Configuration Just add tags to any page: --- date: 2018-11-29T08:41:44+01:00 title: Theme tutorial weight: 15 tags: ["tutorial", "theme"] --- Behavior The tags are displayed at the top of the page, in their insertion order. Each tag is a link to a Taxonomy page displaying all the articles with the given tag. List all the tags In the config.
